column4: The Composite extension is not available thats the box that pops up wut can I do to fix the problem on my effects
add into xorg.conf 3 lines 1: Section "Extensions" 2: Option "Composite" "Enable" 3: EndSection
To edit that file,: gksudo gedit /etc/X11/xorg.conf
To make that change take effect, log out of ubuntu, then at the login screen do  ctrl-backspace    then it should load up the login screen again. login as usual then and try the composite stuff
